title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2095/98 of 30 September 1998 fixing the estimated production of olive oil and the amount of the unit production aid that may be paid in advance for the 1997/98 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2095/98 of 30 September 1998 fixing the estimated production of olive oil and the amount of the unit production aid that may be paid in advance for the 1997/98 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1997/98 marketing year the estimated production shall be 2 290 600 tonnes, and the unit amount of the production aid that may be paid in advance shall be ECU 72,53 per 100 kilograms.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 September 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
